results.definition: the act of caressing with the lips (or an instance thereof)
touch with the lips or press the lips (against someone's mouth or other body part) as an expression of love, greeting, etc.
examples: She kissed her grandfather on the forehead when she entered the room

results.definition: a cookie made of egg whites and sugar

examples: there was a brief kiss of their hands in passing
the blossoms were kissed by the soft rain
